name: EventSpace
0:
”Alexa, ask event space what's happening in Dublin”
”Alexa, ask event space when is Coldplay playing”
”Alexa, open event space and find gigs for Roger Waters in Dublin”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: event space
des:
Event Space, a premium event finder skill, which integrates seamlessly into your daily workflow to help you find interesting things happening around your city.

Find events near you. Never miss a single gig, play or conference in your town. Powered by a backend system which features tens of thousands of events updated daily in hundreds of major cities worldwide, this skill provides the perfect opportunity to track events happening in your city or town and send more info about them to your Alexa app. 

There are two ways you can use this skill. The conversational approach...
Just say: "Alexa, ask event space, what's going on in Dublin tomorrow" 
or even simply,
"Alexa, open event space"
In this approach, Alexa asks you to fulfil 4 different parameters to give you the most accurate result: Category, City, Date and Keywords
After that, you can confirm if Alexa picked up what you said correctly or retry it again. After confirming, all available events are filtered and querried and presented to you and to your Alexa app, in pages of 5 results at a time.

The one-shot approach...
If you want to avoid the hassle of the previous approach and get your results quickly, just say:
"Alexa, open event space and find gigs for Lord Huron in Dublin"
or
"Alexa, ask event space when Coldplay is playing"
In this approach, Alexa will not ask you any more information. All that you say is querried and presented to you immediately. Try to be as specific as possible to get the best match.

There are several categories that you can choose from, including:
- Music
- Film and theater
- Comedy
- Leaning and Education
- Family and Kids
- Food and Wine
- Festivals and Concerts
- Art shows and galleries
- Clubs and societies
- Politics
- Science and Technology

If you like what you hear, please do take some time off to rate the skill. Your contribution goes a long way in helping me develop more apps in the future. If you find any bugs, or would like to contact me directly, you can find me here: akash.360@aol.com

Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
